channel.title: CVE Feed for unspecified -- jLEMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for unspecified -- jLEMS

item.title: CVE-2022-4583|2024-08-03T01:41:45.872Z -- unspecified -- jlems
item.description: A vulnerability was found in jLEMS. It has been declared as critical. Affected by this vulnerability is the function unpackJar of the file src/main/java/org/lemsml/jlems/io/util/JUtil.java. The manipulation leads to path traversal. The attack can be launched remotely. The name of the patch is 8c224637d7d561076364a9e3c2c375daeaf463dc. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier VDB-216169 was assigned to this vulnerability.
